titleStmt.title: [Re]stitucyon shulde be made.
titleStmt.author: Basilica di San Pietro in Vaticano.
Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: A version of STC 14077c.102, Artycles of the great indulgence of plenary remissyon.
Date of publication suggested by STC.
Imperfect: only known copy; bottom half of sheet only, with STC 14077c.150 on verso; incorrectly mounted with top half of STC 14077c.88.
Last paragraph begins: Also our soueraygne lorde kyng Henry the .viii.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
